about.title: About me
about.general: My name is Mathias Wellner and I live in Leipzig. I have also lived in Dresden, Zurich and Darmstadt. And for one year, I have lived in Blacksburg/Virginia.
about.job: I work for DB Netz AG as software developer, mainly front-end (Angular). But I have studied and used a lot of technologies, such as
about.politics: I am member of the Green Party in the Leipzig district chapter. I am co-spokesman for the group climate and energy and also working in the podcast group.
